value.name: Afghanistan
value.description: Do not travel to Afghanistan due to crime, terrorism, civil unrest, kidnapping, and armed conflict.

value.name: Central African Republic
value.description: Do not travel to Central African Republic (CAR) due to crime, civil unrest, and kidnapping.

value.name: Haiti
value.description: Do not travel to Haiti due to crime, civil unrest, and kidnapping.

value.name: Iran (Islamic Republic of)
value.description: Do not travel to Iran due to the risk of kidnapping, arrest, detention of U.S. citizens.

value.name: Iraq
value.description: Do not travel to Iraq due to terrorism, kidnapping, and armed conflict.

value.name: Libya
value.description: Do not travel to Libya due to crime, terrorism, civil unrest, kidnapping, and armed conflict.

value.name: Mali
value.description: Do not travel to Mali due to crime, terrorism, and kidnapping.

value.name: Korea (Democratic People's Republic of)
value.description: Do not travel to North Korea due to the serious risk of arrest and long-term detention of U.S. nationals.

value.name: Somalia
value.description: Do not travel to Somalia due to crime, terrorism, kidnapping and piracy.

value.name: South Sudan
value.description: Do not travel to South Sudan due to crime, kidnapping, and armed conflict.

value.name: Syrian Arab Republic
value.description: Do not travel to Syria due to terrorism, civil unrest, kidnapping, and armed conflict.

value.name: Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of)
value.description: Do not travel to Venezuela due to crime, civil unrest, poor health infrastructure, kidnapping, and arbitrary arrest and detention of U.S. citizens.

value.name: Yemen
value.description: Do not travel to Yemen due to terrorism, civil unrest, health risks, kidnapping, and armed conflict.
